audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Bitterness
audio_sermons.description: There is one thing in my life as a believer that can not only destroy me spiritually, but also affect me physically. It is the one area that opens my life to  the enemy to have direct attacks. The more that I have living in the this area the more my life with be stalled in my spiritual life. God commands each believer to live within the area of forgiveness.

audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Humility
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan speaks on having a view of humility. Pride will destroy us as Christians. How can I live in humility towards God and People. Jim shares Biblical truth on how to live in humility and how it is that Satan attacks us as believers towards pride and selfishness.

audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Parenting
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan has raised 4 Godly kids with his wife Marguerite Logan. He shares how to rely on God for the right attitudes in raising our children. Jim Logan shares the with children it isn't what is wrong with this, but what is right with this as a believer. He shares as parents how are we to raise Godly children who love God.

audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Pride
audio_sermons.description: What did Satan do to cause him to be removed from Heaven? It wasn't drugs, alcohol, pornography, money. It was the sin of Pride. Jim Logan will share how when I am living with pride in my life, not only as I sinning against God, but I am standing with the enemy. Pride is sometime as simple as the centering life all about me. Do you have pride in your life? Are there areas of your life not under the control of God? If so, this message is for you!

audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Spiritual Dating
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan shares how God calls us to live with a moral life. When I am pursing a spouse, God is concerned where my heart is in the matter. Jim shares the almost lost knowledge of pursing on a spiritual level and NOT a physical level. If are questioning what to do when single, then this message is for you!

audio_sermons.title: Attitudes On Worry
audio_sermons.description: But I worry, what is so wrong with that? Are you a professional worrier? God knowing the human nature of worrying about the future, therefore He shared with us what to do when we face situations of worry. Follow Jim Logan as he shares from his own life and the people he has counseled with how prayer is a replacement for worry.

audio_sermons.title: Conquering The Root Of Strongholds
audio_sermons.description: Does something have a hold upon an area of your life that you have been trying to stop? Jim Logan shares that the Bible calls those "strongholds," and all of us have these strongholds within our lives, but he reveals how God gives us the power to conquer them.

audio_sermons.title: Dangers in Spiritualist Practices
audio_sermons.description: Is doing occult activity really bad if I am a Christian? What if I am not doing the "evil" stuff? Dr. Logan has been all over the world talking to animistic people groups on Spiritual Warfare. Many of those locations Dr. Logan would come across the topic of the occult, since many of them lived in it. What should a Christians stand be on occultic activity?

audio_sermons.title: Dark Night Of The Soul
audio_sermons.description: Have you been praying and praying to God for an answer and you feel as if He is not answering you? Have you been super depressed from the lost of a job or loved one? Have you had an extremely painful experience and you feel like God has left you? These are some examples of the Dark Night of the Soul. Dr. Jim Logan explains personally how he had to enter this dark place and he shares what should I do when I am there.

audio_sermons.title: Feeling Safe in a World Gone Mad
Five Elements Of A Victorious Life
How to Become a Person of Prayer
How to help kids under attack
Husbands As Spiritual Protectors
audio_sermons.description: Men, have you been caught in some area of sin you can't get rid of? Dr. Logan's ministry Biblical Restoration Ministries is primarily geared towards counseling men. The greatest area of attack that satan goes for is sexual sins. Most men that come to the office for counseling are in pornography and deeper forms for sexual sins. If Satan can get a man in bondage to sin, then he has permission to attack the rest of the family. Men, this is important message for you, but one that can encourage you as Dr. Logan shares how we walk through a man through sexual forgiveness from God and then spiritual healing, and finally internal peace.

audio_sermons.title: I Said Yes When I should have said No!
audio_sermons.description: As technology has increased in the world, so has the ability to do evil. What happens if you know someone or you personally are addicted to sexual sins. Dr. Logan reveals the process of helping someone be free of sexual sins. This video has been uploaded by permission of Biblical Restoration Ministries, Inc. WARNING: This audio does contain mature topics and is intended for counselors and adults.

audio_sermons.title: Overcoming Worry
audio_sermons.description: All of us struggle with worry in this life, yet our legacy as believer is the experience of inner peace. Jim Logan presents practical principles from the Bible for understanding and overcoming worry, and important strategies for building an effective prayer life.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 1 "The Battle"
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan has talked all over the world on the topic of Spiritual Warfare. He authored the book "Reclaiming Surrendered Ground" and is currently working at Biblical Restoration Ministries in Sioux City, Iowa. This 8 part series on Spiritual warfare was recorded more than 10 years ago at a J.A.R.S. conference and has been seen by hundreds of people. Jim Logan starts the conference with understanding the spiritual battle.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 2 "Resistance"
audio_sermons.description: In the spiritual battle we have an enemy. This enemy wants to destroy us and will use everything he can to try and destroy what he can in our lives. It is important that we understand how to resist and  fight against him in the Power of God.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 3 "The Armor Of God"
audio_sermons.description: Am I fighting against the enemy or letting him win the battle over me? As a follower of Jesus Christ it is very important as the apostle Paul says to put on the armor of God. Jim Logan takes Ephesians 6 and reveals how can I simply put on God's armor to fight the spiritual battles in my life.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 4 "Principalities And Powers"
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan continues the series on Spiritual Warfare with an understanding of the enemy's weapons. He will be sharing from Ephesians 6 and sharing from many encounters from all over the world. Since Satan was defeated years ago by the cross, why is it that I see him working in my life or the life of others?

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 5 "Our Position In Christ"
audio_sermons.description: One of Satan primary attacks is to attack our identity. Jim Logan explains that importance of knowing who I am in Christ. This is where the enemy attacks and wants us to focus on ourselves instead of God in us.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 6 "Manifestation Of Demons"
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan shares what happens when the enemy has ground in a person's life. Jim explains the authority a believer has over the enemy because of Christ. This is encouraging video to see how much POWER Christ has over the enemy, even in my personal life of temptations.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 7 "How The Enemy Attacks"
audio_sermons.description: Do you feel like you are under attack of the enemy? Why is it when I pray it is as if I am alone? Jim Logan explains how enemy attacks believers. Knowing that the spiritual battle is in my mind, allows me the ability to CHOSE what I think about day to day.

audio_sermons.title: Spiritual Warfare - 8 "How We Can Help Others"
audio_sermons.description: Jim Logan concludes the Spiritual Warfare conference by sharing how we can help other people that we are in contact with every day. While the focus is not the enemy, but Jesus how can we share the JOY of Christ through our relationships.

audio_sermons.title: Teens Who Are Out Of Control
audio_sermons.description: Look into the heart of teenager from Jim Logan's 20+ years of Biblical Counseling. Teens today desire one-on-one relationships more than ever in the past. As a counselor Jim shares how its easy for teens to loose hope. This audio is encouraging to parents and teenagers.

audio_sermons.title: The Importance Of The Secret Place
audio_sermons.description: Did you know that Psalm 91 Promises that if we dwell in the secret place of the Most High then we shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty, then I would be able to say of the Lord that He is my refuge, my fortress, my God; in him will I trust, and surely He will deliver me.

audio_sermons.title: Woman's Most Vulnerable Area of Attack
audio_sermons.description: Ladies, the Bible shares that woman are prone to a couple of area of attack from the enemy. Do you know what are those two areas? Dr. Logan shares from the 30+ years of counseling how to help woman in there areas of attack. Dr. Logan also shares that men have the responsibility to protect their wife from "naturally" turning to this area.
